name: Sheep Heard
description:
Help Michel, a shepherd dog, lead the sheep to safety from the many hungry wolves. But your instructions need to spread into the fresh air of the meadow, so it can be delayed. Will you pass the seven levels ?

Buttons : arrow keys to shout a direction, spacebar to shout Michel to stop.

A "presque" game made in less than 72 hours with Jox for Ludum Dare 50

Music Credits : Super Friendly by Kevin MacLeod, Fuzzball by Kevin MacLeod, Fearless First by Kevin MacLeod and Destiny Day by Kevin MacLeod. 
Links : https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4442-super-friendly, https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/5044-fuzzball-parade, https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/3742-fearless-first, https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4984-destiny-day.
